name: unsatisfied
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
feeling that something is not enough or not good enough: After dinner he still felt unsatisfied.
If you have an unsatisfied wish, you have not got what you wanted: There is unsatisfied demand for the product. unsatisfied curiosity/desire
